sqlMap.select: select * from t_character_goods where f_character_id =#characterId# and f_position >=#beginPostion# and f_position <=#endPostion#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_character_goods (f_id, f_character_id, f_goodmodel_id, f_position, f_in_horse_id, f_count, f_bind, f_quickbarindex, f_curr_durability, f_max_durability, f_is_show, f_is_use, f_base_desc, f_born_lv, f_strengthen_desc, f_addition_desc, f_in_equip_id, f_stall_copper, f_stall_ingot, f_chongqi_owner_id, f_chongqi_owner_name, f_last_date, f_wugong_id, f_shelizhi_in_equip_id, f_tupo_cnt, f_totem, f_shelizhi_rongxue, f_totem_usrname, f_male_name, f_female_name, f_couple_date, f_born_strengthen_cnt, f_strone_addproperty) values (#id:VARCHAR#, #characterId:INTEGER#, #goodmodelId:INTEGER#, #position:SMALLINT#, #inHorseId:INTEGER#, #count:INTEGER#, #bind:TINYINT#, #quickbarindex:INTEGER#, #currDurability:INTEGER#, #maxDurability:INTEGER#, #isShow:TINYINT#, #isUse:TINYINT#, #baseDesc:VARCHAR#, #bornLv:INTEGER#, #strengthenDesc:VARCHAR#, #additionDesc:VARCHAR#, #inEquipId:VARCHAR#, #stallCopper:INTEGER#, #stallIngot:INTEGER#, #chongqiOwnerId:INTEGER#, #chongqiOwnerName:VARCHAR#, #lastDate:TIMESTAMP#, #wugongId:INTEGER#, #shelizhiInEquipId:VARCHAR#, #tupoCnt:INTEGER#, #totem:VARCHAR#, #shelizhiRongxue:BIT#, #totemUsrname:VARCHAR#, #maleName:VARCHAR#, #femaleName:VARCHAR#, #coupleDate:TIMESTAMP#, #bornStrengthenCnt:INTEGER#, #stroneAddproperty:VARCHAR#)
